localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
blogPost.body: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
blogPost.title: GitWrapped - View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years
blogPost.author: DanCodes

localize.description: GitWrased允许你查看这些年来你的Github个人资料的统计数据，你写了多少行，你完成了多少拉请求等等！与您的朋友比较统计数据并在社交媒体上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享这些年来您是如何为Github做出贡献的

localize.description: GitWrased允許你查看這些年來你的Github個人資料的統計數據，你寫了多少行，你完成了多少拉請求等等！與您的朋友比較統計數據並在社交媒體上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享這些年來您是如何爲Github做出貢獻的

previous.title: RT @Breaking911: A New York public school principal sent a letter to white parents advocating for “white abolition” and urging students to…

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 纽约一所公立学校的校长给白人家长发了一封信 倡导 "废除白人 "并敦促学生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
纽约一所公立学校校长给白人家长发信，鼓吹 "废白"，敦促学生成为种族的 "叛徒"。

学校员工被迫参加谴责白种人 "家长制 "和 "权力囤积 "的演讲--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 紐約一所公立學校的校長給白人家長髮了一封信 倡導 "廢除白人 "並敦促學生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
紐約一所公立學校校長給白人家長髮信，鼓吹 "廢白"，敦促學生成爲種族的 "叛徒"。

學校員工被迫參加譴責白種人 "家長制 "和 "權力囤積 "的演講--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen

next.excerpt: Auth. is a 2FA and OTP management tool for everyone. Works with all Apple personal devices - support handoff and keychain. Scan the QR Code and Done! Or you may add your account manually from your provider. Safari extension is also available for auto-fill-in.
next.title: auth. - 2FA , MFA, OTP, Secure Code for Apple devices

localize.description: Auth.是一款适合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。适用于所有苹果个人设备--支持交接和钥匙扣。扫描二维码就可以了! 或者你可以从你的供应商手动添加你的帐户。Safari扩展也可用于自动填写。
Auth.是一款適合所有人使用的2FA和OTP管理工具。適用於所有蘋果個人設備--支持交接和鑰匙扣。掃描二維碼就可以了! 或者你可以從你的供應商手動添加你的帳戶。Safari擴展也可用於自動填寫。
